name: magnet.io
description:
It is highly recommended to download the game.

Disclaimer: Options only work in the downloaded game

Play on fullscreen for a better experience.

If your game is lagging, try another browser!

Magnet.io is a fun unique endless .IO game. You can collect points with your magnetic abilities and transport them into your base without anyone stealing it from you. You also lose size when you are out in the wild, so you need to time everything well.

This game was made for the Jame Gam : IO Edition by LaIQ and Mavelan.

Controls:

Move with the mouse cursor

Press [MOUSE0] to activate "Force Mode"

Press [N] to toggle nametags

Time to Beat:

Endless

How does this fit the jam modifier?

You shrink with time when you are outside your base.

Credits:

  • LaIQ (website)
  • Mavelan
